original_text: Then I will give you rain in due season, and the land shall yield her increase, and the trees of the field shall yield their fruit.
korean_text: 내가 너희에게 철따라 비를 주리니 땅은 그 산물을 내고 밭의 나무는 열매를 맺으리라

sentences.original_text: Then I will give you rain in due season
and the land shall yield her increase
and the trees of the field shall yield their fruit
